mapred

Class TaskTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • mapred.TaskTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, TaskTrackerInterface

    public class TaskTracker
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements TaskTrackerInterface
    This class is used to initialize the Task Tracker which was used to monitor the tasks running on the node and communicate with the JobTracker server.
    Author:
    menglonghe, sidilin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • handleDataNodeFailure

        public static void handleDataNodeFailure(java.lang.Integer jobID,
                         java.lang.Integer numOfChunks,
                         JobConfiguration jobConf,
                         java.util.ArrayList<KVPair> pairLists,
                         java.lang.String classname,
                         java.lang.Integer mapperNum,
                         RMIServiceInfo rmiServiceInfo,
                         int tryNums)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used to handle the failure about the situation: the node is down. It redistribute the chunks and restart some new threads to run the work to the end. It at most run the times set in the configuration files.

        numOfChunks -
        jobConf -
        pairLists -
